title: Personal portfolio
description: A modern, responsive, and animated personal portfolio website built with React, Vite, and Tailwind CSS. This project showcases my skills, projects, and experience with a sleek and interactive user interface.

title: Movie Tracker
description: Movie Tracker is a full-stack web application that allows users to browse movies and TV shows, authenticate using Google or Trakt, and view data from TMDB, OMDB, and Trakt APIs. The project is fully dockerized so you can run the entire stack with a single command.

title: Java library system
description: A Java-based client-server library management system with user authentication, book rentals, and admin monitoring capabilities.
